name: Custom Input
description: Multi-variant text input with validation, icons, and password toggle
longDescription: A highly flexible text input component with 5 visual variants (default, outlined, filled, underlined, search), 3 size presets, built-in password toggle, multiline support with auto-expanding on Android, clearable mode, error/success validation states, and full customization via style overrides and custom color themes. Zero external dependencies — uses only core React Native APIs.
features: 5 visual variants: default, outlined, filled, underlined, search
Error, success, and helper text states
Built-in search icon for search variant
Fully customizable colors via theme override
TypeScript support with full type definitions

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the input

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text shown when empty

props.name: value
props.description: Current value of the input

props.name: onChangeText
props.description: Callback fired when text changes

props.name: variant
props.description: Visual variant of the input

props.name: size
props.description: Size preset affecting height, font size, and padding

props.name: secureTextEntry
props.description: Hide text for password fields

props.name: autoPassword
props.description: Show password visibility toggle icon (use with secureTextEntry)

props.name: multiline
props.description: Enable multiline text input

props.name: numberOfLines
props.description: Initial number of visible lines (multiline)

props.name: maxNumberOfLines
props.description: Maximum lines before scrolling (Android)

props.name: leftIcon
props.description: Custom icon element on the left side

props.name: rightIcon
props.description: Custom icon element on the right side

props.name: error
props.description: Error message (shows red border and text)

props.name: success
props.description: Success message (shows green border and text)

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below the input

props.name: required
props.description: Show required asterisk on label

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disable the input

props.name: clearable
props.description: Show clear × button when input has value

props.name: onClear
props.description: Callback when clear button is pressed

props.name: colors
props.description: Custom color theme override (primary, background, border, text, placeholder, error, success, disabled)

usage.title: Default Input
Outlined Variant
usage.code:
<CustomInput
  variant="outlined"
  label="Email"
  placeholder="you@example.com"
  keyboardType="email-address"
  value={email}
  onChangeText={setEmail}
/>

usage.title: Password Input
usage.code:
<CustomInput
  label="Password"
  placeholder="Enter password"
  secureTextEntry
  autoPassword
  value={password}
  onChangeText={setPassword}
/>

usage.title: Search Input
usage.code:
<CustomInput
  variant="search"
  placeholder="Search..."
  value={query}
  onChangeText={setQuery}
  clearable
  onClear={() => setQuery('')}
/>

usage.title: With Validation
usage.description: Input showing error and success states
usage.code:
<CustomInput
  label="Email"
  placeholder="you@example.com"
  value={email}
  onChangeText={setEmail}
  error={!isValid ? 'Please enter a valid email' : ''}
  success={isValid ? 'Looks good!' : ''}
  required
/>

usage.title: Multiline Input
usage.code:
<CustomInput
  label="Bio"
  placeholder="Tell us about yourself..."
  multiline
  numberOfLines={3}
  size="large"
  value={bio}
  onChangeText={setBio}
/>
